QuestData.Title: Finding Brytag
QuestData.Description: <Kell barely manages to speak.>$B$BThat naga witch... has given many of my kin... to the sea giants.$B$BBrytag was... the last one I saw alive.$B$BFind him quickly.
QuestData.RewardText: I do not know who you are, but you are not a sea giant, and that is enough for me.
